DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial evaluate efficacy TAT ( Tapas Acupressure Technique ) compare Social Support ( SS ) group primary outcome weight loss maintenance . We recruit obese adult Kaiser Permanente Northwest manage care set . Those meet eligibility criterion enter intensive six-month weekly group-based behavioral weight loss program . Those meet threshold weight loss criterion ( n=~288 ) randomly assign either TAT instruction social support group . Participants group attend schedule group meeting parallel contact hour . Participants TAT group advise practice technique home . Participants weigh questionnaire administer entry , randomization , 12 18 month post entry . The main outcome measure weight 18 month .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Tapas Acupressure Weight Loss Maintenance
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Phase I weight loss program : Men woman At least 30 year age BMI 3050 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Weight < 400 lbs Reside Portland metropolitan area include Vancouver/Clark County , Washington Willing able participate aspect intervention Willing attend groupbased weight loss program 6 month Willing follow reduce calorie healthy dietary pattern Willing exercise regular basis Willing lose 10 pound 6month weight loss program Willing accept random assignment one two maintenance intervention Willing provide inform consent Exclusion criterion Phase I weight loss program Medical condition treatment would contraindicate use diet exercise weight loss treatment Treatment cancer ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) currently past 2 year Diabetes treat insulin ; exclude dietcontrolled , control sulfonylurea ( glyburide , glipizide , etc . ) primary physician 's approval , control oral agent ( metformin , precose , glitazone . ) Psychiatric hospitalization past 2 year Conditions require limitation physical activity Congestive heart failure Cardiovascular disease ( stroke , MI , CABG , angioplasty/stent ) past 2 year Taking weight loss medication currently within past 6 month Any history weight loss surgery schedule surgery weight loss . Liposuction past 12 month Prior acupuncture acupressure treatment weight loss Planning leave area prior end program Body weight change > 20 pound past 6 month Pregnant , breast feeding , plan pregnancy prior end participation Current participation another clinical trial Investigator discretion safety adherence reason Household member ( live address ) another participant study LIFE clinical trial staff member family member LIFE trial staff person
